words.word_translated: Mr. (a polite way to address a man)
Given (past participle of the verb 'to give')
Plays (referring to a movie or show)
words.sentence: De film speelt af en gegeven aan meneer.
words.sentence_translated: The movie plays out and is given to Mr.

words.sentence: De film is geil en speelt stil af.
words.sentence_translated: The movie is cool and plays quietly.
Mr. goes to the bakery section.
There is lye in the bakery section.

words.word_translated: Doesn't need to (auxiliary verb indicating necessity)
words.sentence: Meneer hoeft niet naar de broodafdeling te gaan.
words.sentence_translated: Mr. doesn't need to go to the bakery section.

words.sentence: Het gebeurt stil in de broodafdeling.
words.sentence_translated: It happens quietly in the bakery section.
